title: The Forsyte saga. - Vol. 02: Episodes 03-04
subject_group: Literature/English literature - Film and video adaptations
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television series
description: To the clatter of hansom cabs on London's cobbled streets, the story of the Forsytes unfurls. Soames Forsyte persuades the beautiful but distant Irene to marry him, though on one rather strange condition, and from the start their marriage is totally devoid of warmth and communication. Jo is at last free to marry his mistress, Helene and his daughter, June, becomes engaged to a bohemian young architect who threatens to bring another strain of unpredictability to the Forsyte family, challenging its established preoccupations of money and property.
